typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SalesID as integer,
		Amount as integer,
		Quantity as integer,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CurrencySales
source(output(
		Date as string,
		Country as string,
		Value as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ExchangeRates
ExchangeRates derive(Value = toDecimal(Value,4)) ~> ModifyColumns1
Lookup1 derive(newamount = Amount * Value) ~> ConvertCurrency
ConvertCurrency derive(OldTotal = Quantity * Amount,
		NewTotal = Quantity * newamount) ~> Totals
SetExchangeDate, ModifyColumns1 lookup(CurrencySales@Country == ExchangeRates@Country
	&& ExchangeDate == Date,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Lookup1
CurrencySales derive(ExchangeDate = '2017-12-01') ~> SetExchangeDate
Totals sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['newcurrency.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		SalesID,
		Amount,
		Quantity,
		Country = ExchangeRates@Country,
		Value,
		newamount,
		OldTotal,
		NewTotal
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
